name: Free Notion Template For Students
description: The Notion Template made by learners for learners.Can you remember all of those times where you had to learn something, but then you didn’t achieve the results you wanted.Let me tell you something: The problem is not you.What sets us apart in terms of studying are the techniques that we use to learn new things. Let me make this clear: The only thing you need to do is change how you study.But don’t worry: this doesn’t involve studying for hours and hours. In fact, you’ll notice that, after using
features: Yes. This template is intended for people who want to learn something based on real techniques of accelerated learning. Even people who are advanced at Notion can benefit from this.; Yes. As long as you’re trying to master a new ability or learn something new, you can and should use this template.; Yes. This template is brought to you byGumroad, which uses data encryption to protect your information.
